descriptionHtml:
[I English is not almost speak]
[b][This sentence is a Google translation.][/b]
[u][size=3][b][This MOD is not a Lore friendly][/b][/size][/u]


[size=6][b]About this mod[/b][/size]
[size=2]This mod 5[/size] people will add a stand -alone followers .


[size=3][b]////These girls have a weapon dedicated respectively .////[/b][/size]
Three prepared have . Please let equipped to choose to match the difficulty of the game .


[size=2]///Combat type of "[/size][size=3]Michelle[/size][size=2]" fight with fists of both hands .
[/size][b]Michelle can not be fighting in long distance .
She is not strong with bare hands[/b]
[size=2]
///Combat type of "[/size][size=3]Madoka[/size][size=2]" I will fight with melee weapons .
Especially good at fighting in dual wield .
[/size][size=2]Madoka bow is not good , but I can use .
[/size]
///Fighting style of "[b][size=3]Mia[/size][/b]" is fighting with melee weapons .
In particular we are facing in fighting in two-hands sword .
You can use the magic of lightning in the fighting in long distance .

///Fighting style of "[size=3]Mira[/size]" will be long distance specialized by bow
It is used when it was approached if ask have a weapon for short distance

///Fighting style of Matoi combat with melee weapons and shields
Since the self-healing magic also has I can respond to various tactical situation .

[size=2]She is Essential and cannot die.[/size]
[size=2]Body type : UNP[/size]
[size=2]
Location : Michelle/Whiterun BanneredMare
                Madoka/Warmaiden's[/size]
[size=2]                Mia/Arcadias Cauldron
                Mira/Drunken Huntsman
                Matoi/Belethor's General Goods

Perk : Michelle/Light Armor,Heavy Armor,sneak,Pickpocket[/size]
          Madoka/One-handed,Smithing,Two-handed,Light Armor,Heavy Armor
          Mia/One-handed,Two-handed,Light Armor,Heavy Armor,Destruction
          Mira/Archery,One-handed,Two-handed,Light Armor,Heavy Armor
          Matoi/Light Armor,Heavy Armor,One-handed,Block,Restoration

[size=6]Change Log[/size]
[size=2]v4.0/I 've implemented the Matoi of new followers . In addition we have made ​​a minor fixes .
v3.2/The compression of texture I was conducted .
v3.1bugfixes/Modification of files of eyebrows
v3.1/Fixed face of Michelle[/size][size=2]
[/size]v3.0/[size=5][b][u]Dawnguard will be required .[/u][/b][/size] New will add two followers .
v2.0/I 've implemented a follower Madoka of close combat entities .
v1.0/added the Neutral Face in the options file .
